content.text: What do you do for fun on weekends?
I love to learn about the universe! I am fascinated by the stars and planets.
That's cool! I like to watch and listen to music to clear my head.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a little bit of everything. I love classic rock like the Beatles and the Rolling Stones. I also like country music and dance music.
I'm more of a country music fan myself. I love listening to old country songs from the 90s.
I love old country too! I love the story-telling aspect of country music.
Me too! I love how the songs can be so relatable and touching.
Do you have any favorite country artists?
I love George Strait, Alan Jackson, and Brad Paisley.
I love those guys too! I also love Toby Keith and Kenny Chesney.
Those are great artists! I love how they all have their own unique sounds.
They do! Country music is such a great genre because there is something for everyone.
I agree! I'm so glad we had this conversation. It's always nice to meet someone who loves country music as much as I do.
Me too! It's been great chatting with you.
